commit.message:
g-allein.ads (vec_dst): Remove.

2015-02-20  Olivier Hainque  <hainque@adacore.com>

	* g-allein.ads (vec_dst): Remove.
	* g-alveop.ad?: Replace vec_dst renamings by proper Inline_Always
	wrappers with Intrinsic convention.

From-SVN: r220861
